| History                 = Led by [[Gorgilla Alpha (Earth-616)|Gorgilla Alpha]], the Ape King, the '''Gorgilla Clan''' was a group of [[Gorgillas]] that sought to dominate and destroy everything they encountered, including any [[Homo erectus|cavemen]] they found.{{r|Avengers Vol 8 13}}

This changed when the Gorgilla Clan came into conflict with the exiled [[Fan Fei (Earth-616)|Fan Fei]] of [[K'un-Lun]], the [[Iron Fist]] of 1,000,000 B.C., as she easily took them out with her [[Glossary:Martial arts|martial arts]] training.{{r|Avengers Vol 8 13}}

[[Mephisto (Earth-616)|Mephisto]], recently scorned by Iron Fist, brought the gift of fire to the Gorgilla Clan and later, when the Ape King's diamond club was destroyed, led him to the [[Power Stone]]. Despite these technological boons, the Gorgillas were still defeated by Iron Fist.{{r|Avengers Vol 8 13}}
